All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddGitHooksMojo
A Mojo class to add git hooks to the project.
BashScriptCommitMsgHookGenerator
A class representing bash script commit-msg hook generator.
CommitMsgConfiguration
A class represents a commit-msg hook configuration.
CommitMsgParameters
A class to hold commit message configuration's parameters.
GitHookConfiguration
Provides methods for specific git hook configuration.
GitHookFileGenerator
Provides the necessary methods for git hooks file generation.
GitHooksAreDisabledException
Thrown when trying to interact with git hooks in globally disabled state.
GitHooksConfiguration
A class represents git hooks configuration parameters.
GitHooksParameters
A class to hold git hooks configuration's parameters..
Messages
Utility class for constant messages.
NoEnabledGitHooksFoundException
Thrown when trying to interact with git hooks, but no individual enabled git hooks were found.
ParameterSanitizer
Utility class for parameters sanitization.
RuntimeIOException
An unchecked wrapper for IOException.
